metadata.explaination: The drone is currently surrounded by unvisited areas and obstacles (walls) on the upper side. Moving right is a safe option to explore new areas without immediate risk of collision.
metadata.message_to_another_drone: Proceeding to the right to explore unvisited areas. Be cautious of obstacles on the upper side of the grid.
metadata.long_term_strategy: Focus on exploring the right side sector and then move downward to cover the unexplored area.

metadata.explaination: The drone is surrounded by obstacles on the left and can safely move to the right where there are unvisited areas. This will help in exploring new regions and avoid obstacles.
metadata.message_to_another_drone: Moving right to explore unvisited areas. I will cover this path while you proceed further right if possible.
metadata.long_term_strategy: Explore the right side sector, focusing on unvisited areas while avoiding obstacles.
